humsafar_express_routes.description: Premium fully air-conditioned 3AC sleeper trains with enhanced features and facilities

routes.name: Nagpur - Amritsar AC SF Express (Humsafar livery)
Mumbai Central - New Delhi AC Duronto (Humsafar livery)
Coimbatore - Bikaner AC SF Express (Humsafar livery)

features: Modern LHB coaches with better safety features
Fire and smoke detection and suppression system
Mobile/laptop charging points at every berth
Complimentary meals not included (optional catering available)
Launched in 2016 as affordable AC travel option

notes.description: Humsafar Express trains are premium 3AC-only trains designed to provide comfortable overnight journey at affordable prices
notes.livery: Distinctive exterior with vibrant colors depicting Indian culture
notes.target_segment: Middle-class passengers seeking AC travel at reasonable fares
special_features: Passenger-friendly features like coat hooks and magazine holders
notes.stations_note: Only major stations are listed. Some trains may have additional minor stops.
notes.coordinates_note: Coordinates are approximate and based on station locations.
